Question
========

Given is the following situation. In study A, there are three groups with a total of 31 participants. In study B, there are four groups with an unknown number of participants. In how many participants in study B will a $\alpha$ of 5% to two decimal places the critical value of the F -key are the same in both studies? 
Answerlist
----------
* 15 participants
* 16 participants
* 17 participants
* 18 participants


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
